content.rendered: The Science, Math, and Technology Departments would like to invite parents of all 6th and 7th grade students to attend an information night on Tuesday, February 13th from 7:00-8:00 p.m. The information session will provide an overview of the middle school courses, the requirements for accelerated math and science, and a brief review of high school pathways.  The event will be livestreamed on Youtube at the following link: https://youtu.be/qr5bh9NrdWk  We hope you are able to attend.  Should you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to e-mail math department head Jennelle Miles at j_miles@saratogaschools.org, science department head John Scrivo at j_scrivo@saratogaschools.org, or technology department head Mike Gallagher m_gallagher@saratogaschools.org.
